path: Boxes/Temple College Nursing Program/LVN Program/Summer 24/Basic Nursing Skills/Documents/Module IV Objectives.pdf
text: TEMPLE COLLGE VOCATIONAL NURISNG PROGRAM BASIC NURSING SKILLS: VNSG 1423 MODULE IV – URINARY AND BOWEL ELIMINATION Chapters 29 & 30 – Williams After completing this module the students will be able to: 1. Perform a focused assessment of urinary elimination; identify normal and abnormal findings. 2. Describe different nursing measures to help patients urinate and manage urinary incontinence. 3. Compare and contrast the purpose and principle of indwelling and intermittent catheterization, how to insert an indwelling catheter using sterile technique, and perform catheter care. 4. Perform a focused assessment of bowel elimination; identifying normal and abnormal findings. 5. Describe the nursing care associated with abnormal bowel elimination such as constipation and intestinal diversions.
